body_html: @niffler92 I saw this PR merged in Nov #2953 which seems like it should handle what this PR was intending to do, though in v0.3.1 it looks like you are not able to use from_numpy with numpy arrays of type np.half or use .numpy(). If necessary I can try bringing this PR up to date
body_text: @niffler92 I saw this PR merged in Nov #2953 which seems like it should handle what this PR was intending to do, though in v0.3.1 it looks like you are not able to use from_numpy with numpy arrays of type np.half or use .numpy(). If necessary I can try bringing this PR up to date
body: @niffler92 I saw this PR merged in Nov https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/2953 which seems like it should handle what this PR was intending to do, though in v0.3.1 it looks like you are not able to use from_numpy with numpy arrays of type np.half or use .numpy(). If necessary I can try bringing this PR up to date
